welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Wittenheim, France! Get ready to be charmed by our picturesque town known for its beautiful architecture and rich history. We hope you enjoy your stay and discover all the wonderful things our city has to offer."

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Euroairport Swiss Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Euroairport Swiss Airport, mainly used for low-cost airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.description: The main terminal for international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: The secondary terminal for domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
